about_the_game:
Rich Gameplay, Build a Prosperous and Wealthy City in the Medieval Era!


Following the story of a protagonist who is a feudal lord of the Late Medieval Holy Roman Empire, as a vassal under his liege the Holy Roman Emperor Friedrich von Habsburg, and as a Prince-elector of the Empire and the powerful Duke of Saxony, he develops an undeveloped territory within the duchy.
Face challenges like interference from neighboring territories, harsh natural environments including severe winter cold, and the relentless demands of your residents.
Improve the city’s financial status by developing housing, selecting appropriate tax policy options, and processing and exporting abundant raw materials for profitable trade.

[DEMO Version Notice] In the DEMO version, only Stage 1 is available, where you can only experience the journey of a fictional protagonist as a feudal lord and Duke of Saxony in the Holy Roman Empire.


The Castle Area includes the natural environment and geography surrounding the castle you intend to build!




The castle encompasses a designated range around it, constituting the Castle Area. This area includes the natural environment and geography, as well as buildings, population, and dynamic pedestrian traffic.
Based on the area's natural environment and the characteristics of the constructed buildings, you can enhance the castle's production by choosing specialized annex facilities that complement the surroundings, and convert this output into scientific research points or additional gold income.

[DEMO Version Notice] All types of castle facility attachments are available in the DEMO version!


From the stained glass of the chapel to the underground dungeons of the courthouse... Choose your castle annex facilities considering the natural environment and buildings of your castle!



Castle annex facilities refer to the various options that can be chosen for each castle. These facilities determine how natural geographic features, environmental tiles or building tiles, as well as the population or pedestrian traffic within the castle area, can be converted into castle yields.
For example, you might receive a fixed castle yield bonus in rocky hill geographic environments, bonus yields for every library building within the castle area, or additional bonuses from water tiles like seas or rivers.
Choose the right annex facilities for your castle based on the natural environment and geographical characteristics, aligning with the traits of the constructed buildings in the area, to maximize your benefits.

[DEMO Version Notice] You can experience all the rich natural geography in the DEMO version.


Build Castles and Tax Offices to Collect Taxes from Residences!


Wealthier residents in higher-tier houses pay considerably more taxes.
Construct castles and tax offices to effectively tax these residents.

Customize Your City’s Tax Policy with Diverse Tax Policy Settings!


Finely tune your city’s tax system with various available tax policy options.
Strategically combine different city tax policies to achieve a synergistic effect in your fiscal strategy!

Property Tax or Population Tax: Which is More Effective? Experiment with Various Special Taxes!


You can levy a range of special taxes, including property tax, population tax, luxury goods tax, theater performance tax, music hall performance tax, art transaction tax, and environmental proximity tax.
Beyond collecting taxes, you can accelerate operations in production, industrial, and port facilities by providing subsidies.
If funds are lacking, consider obtaining a loan from the bank!

[DEMO Version Notice] All types of special tax collection options are available in the DEMO version.

Analyze Your City’s Financial Health with the Financial Summary Report!


The game’s economic system involves a complex mix of various factors. Understanding income and expenditure is essential for managing city finances.
Use the financial summary report to check if tax administration is aligned with the development level of the city’s housing, whether resident tax income is sufficient, and if buildings too far from the castle are incurring high maintenance costs.

[DEMO Version Notice] You can fully utilize various convenience features such as financial summary reports in the DEMO version.


Increase Revenue by Exporting Goods through Trade, or Meet Needs by Importing Essential Goods!


Trade is conducted by accepting export and import offers through the city-wide trade menu. Exotic luxuries, such as spices like pepper or rare items like tea leaves, can be imported individually at each port building.

[DEMO Version Notice] The trading feature is fully available in the DEMO version.



Sometimes, highly profitable special export opportunities arise. Don’t miss the chance for your city to earn significant revenue!

Winter is Coming. Stockpile Winter Resources!




The game cycles through four seasons: spring, summer, autumn, and winter. With the arrival of winter, the cold intensifies, and the need for winter resources increases.
Failing to adequately prepare during the warmer seasons can lead to falling down of the city due to the harsh winter conditions.

[DEMO Version Notice] In the DEMO version, you can experience and challenge the full winter cold on maps where winter cold is provided.


Freely choose and designate a historical or created religion from the medieval era as the state religion!


There are 9 religions featured in the game. Catholicism, Protestantism, Reformed Church, Episcopal, Orthodox Christianity, as well as Arboreal, Stella, Flamma, and Sorcery You can choose and designate any of these religions as the state religion for your territory. Each religion has its own unique religious policies and effects.

[DEMO Version Notice] In the DEMO version, the religion and state religion features are only partially implemented and provided.


Follow the Engaging Story of a Medieval Feudal Lord with Quests and Missions!



The Medieval Lord faces a significant challenge: Can you protect the movable type printing technology, ingeniously crafted by a city mechanic, and, in spite of the schemes and disruptions from neighboring territories, manage to mass-produce and export valuable books? This critical effort could potentially generate substantial revenue and resolve the chronic financial deficit of his medieval city.
What will be the consequences of the premature invention of the printing press? Each story leads into another, weaving a series of captivating narratives.
In another region, known for its fragrant grapes, is it possible to develop unique grape jam technology and establish a city famous for its grape jam?
Will building a university and upgrading various research facilities lead to successfully monetizing academic and educational services?

[DEMO Version Notice] In the DEMO version, only Stage 1 is available, where you can only experience the journey of a fictional protagonist as a feudal lord and Duke of Saxony in the Holy Roman Empire.


Enjoy Engaging Stories in Stage Mode, or Discover Unique, Rich Gameplay in Random Map Sandbox Mode with Diverse Natural Environments and Tech Trees!


In Stage Mode, engage in interesting stories while advancing through each stage, developing cities and completing missions.
Random Map Sandbox Mode brings a novel gameplay experience in each game, with randomly generated natural environments, research tech trees, trade proposals, and more, forming a dynamic economic environment.

[DEMO Version Notice] Random map sandbox mode is available in the DEMO version. However, achievements and challenges are not provided. Additionally, balance focus selection is not available.


Select Appropriate Research Projects from the Dynamically Generated Random Tech Tree for Each Randomly Generated Map!


In each game, as the natural and economic environments change, making the right choices becomes crucial. From the dynamically generated random tech tree, choose research projects that best suit the evolving situations!
This random tech tree provides a unique gaming experience every time and adds depth to the experience of making economically optimal decisions.

[DEMO Version Notice] Both static common tech trees and dynamically generated random tech trees are provided in the DEMO version.


Medieval City Building Simulation Game, Crowncity


Experience the challenge and excitement of building a thriving medieval city in Crowncity!

short_description: Building and managing a late medieval city is a series of challenges. Build wells to provide drinking water, markets to provide bread and food, and theaters to collect performance tax. Stage mode continues an interesting story and journey, random map mode fills each game with a new experience.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
